attributes.action: Full disclosure and Audit of the 1 billion a month going to foreign Aid
attributes.additional_details: The Financial strain / cost of living Crisis is now at the point where people feel enslaved to the sytem and cannot live or enjoy life anymore. The Government are not helping the citizens of the UK but expect more and more contributions to be given by the working people of the UK through taxation
attributes.background: To stop the 1 billion a  month going to foreign Aid and instead use it to help local councils stop the need to impose Council Rate Increases

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
